ISSUE.TITLE: Feature Request? Content specific assets
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: I'm not sure if this exists. I want the ability to upload assets such as images or movie clips or whatever that are specific to a content item. I think possibly this would be referred to as an AssetsPart. Then in the html of the content item you can reference these assets.
